body.p:
To his Excellency
Thos. E. Bramlet Govener of the Commonwealth of Kentucky

your Petitioner was 1st Lieut in 13th Ky infty in the service of the united States and would respectfully ask permission to form a Squad of about 30 men of the old 13 in order to rid my county of guerrills. Green County Ky and wish a commission and all the assistance you can furnish that is compatible with your the old 13th Regt infty was mustered out of Service on the 12th day of January 1865
Jessee Despain of Green County Ky

Green Co. Ky
13
Despain Jessee
Late 1s Lt. 13" Ky Infy.
To The Gov.
Desires authority to raise a force of 30 of the 13" Ky for protection of this county --

L B No 10 -- 1865 P. 423
Recd A. G. O. Ky 14 Mar. 1865
